============================QT Setup Instruction=====================

1. Make sure you download QT 5.6 from QT offline installer from the website (https://download.qt.io/archive/qt/5.6/5.6.0/). There are different installers for QT 5.6, install the one that matches the solution you want to use (Visual Studio 2013 or 2015)
2- Run the installer. After installation is complete, navigate to the installation path and find the "msvc2015_64" (for VS2015) or "msvc2013_64" (for VS2013) folder under the "5.6" folder and copy it to the \thirdparty\QT5.6\ folder. After the copying done there should be the following directory structure in the thirdparty folder:

\thirdparty\QT5.6\msvc2015_64\...
or 
\thirdparty\QT5.6\msvc2013_64\...
